articles.title: iOS 17 Won't Work on Every iPhone. See if Yours Is on the List - CNET
articles.description: Apple's latest software is ending support for several iPhones.
articles.content: Apple's new iOS 17 software is coming to iPhones later this year and will include many exciting changes. During its WWDC event on June 5, Apple said the new software will be available to download thi… [+1211 chars]
